name: Jonathan Immanuel Brachthäuser
content: Universität Tübingen - Jun.-Prof. Dr. Jonathan Immanuel Brachthäuser Jun.-Prof. Dr. Jonathan Immanuel Brachthäuser Head of the SE research group Jonathan Brachthäuser Software Engineering FB Informatik Universität Tübingen Sand 13 72076 Tübingen Germany Telephone+49 - (0) 70 71 - 29 - 75491 E-Mailjonathan.brachthaeuser(at)uni-tuebingen.de OfficeB215 Office hoursby appointment Publications on Google Scholar Publications on DBLP SELECTED RESEARCH AREAS Ergonomic Type- and Effect Systems Structuring Complex Control Flow Efficient Compilation Publications Publications 2025 The Simple Essence of Monomorphization by Matthew Lutze, Philipp Schuster, and Jonathan Immanuel Brachthäuser In Proceedings of the International Conference on Object-Oriented Programming, Systems, Languages and Applications (OOPSLA), 2025.
